column2: Did you study or teach in India during the Covid-19 pandemic? (In case of a student or teacher) Or if you are a parent, did your children study in India during the pandemic? (Here the pandemic specifically refers to the period between (between March 2020 and Feb 2022)
column4: In which category of institution did your child study during the pandemic period (between March 2020 and Feb 2022)?
column5: Did the introduction of online classes and remote learning during the pandemic cause financial burden on your family?
column6: How satisfied are you with the way online learning was managed by your child’s school/university during the pandemic?
column7: What challenges has your child faced in online classes? (multiple choices can be selected)
column8: Do you have concerns about your child’s academic competence due to shift towards online learning during the pandemic?
column9: What is your opinion on conducting hybrid classes after the Pandemic (Here by hybrid classes, we mean there is an option to either attend live lectures in person or view lecture recordings)
column10: Which of these is most suitable for you?
column11: What are the improvements your child's institution should have made while providing online education?(Optional question)
column12: In which category of institution did you teach during the  pandemic period (between March 2020 and Feb 2022)?
column13: Were you able to adapt with new ways of teaching?
column14: What was the level of engagement of students  in your virtual classes?
column15: Which of these benefits from online teaching apply to you? (multiple choices can be selected)
column16: What challenges did you face while teaching online?  (multiple choices can be selected)
column17: Did your students ask more questions in Remote Learning as compared to physical classes?
column18: What is your opinion on conducting hybrid classes after the Pandemic (Here by hybrid classes, we mean there is an option to either attend live lectures in person or view lecture recordings)
column19: Which form of education is most suitable according to you?
column20: In which category of institution did you study during the pandemic period? (between March 2020 and Feb 2022)
column21: Which devices have you used most often while learning online?
column22: How often did you attend your online classes ?
column23: Which of these possible benefits from online learning during the pandemic apply to you?  (multiple choices can be selected)
column24: What challenges did you face with online education?  (multiple choices can be selected)
column25: What is your opinion on conducting hybrid classes after the Pandemic (Here by hybrid classes, we mean there is an option to either attend live lectures in person or view lecture recordings)
column26: Was your understanding from online learning satisfactory?
column27: Which form of education is most suitable according to you?
